text: Answer: (a), (b), (c) Solution: (@) False, Consider the following schedule [ [ ] [ [ & | [we) [ | [ [ wi | [ [commit] [commit] ] The above schedule is recoverable, but it is not conflict serializable as there is cycle in precedence graph (/12 So, Not conflict serializable (b) False. Every Conlict serializable is view serializable. (c) False. Every strict schedule is cascadeless. Ex: [ 1 [ [ Ry R | | WA [ ] [ W [commit| | [ [Commit above schedule is cascadeless but not strict. (d) True. All cascadeless schedules are recoverable.
